hero.subtitle: Switch to the nearest window in any direction using keyboard shortcuts. Spatial, intuitive, instant.
features.label: — Features
features.title: Built for keyboard-driven workflows
features.spatial.title: Spatial Navigation
features.spatial.desc: Switch windows based on their actual screen position — not an arbitrary list order.
features.visibility.title: Visibility-Aware
features.visibility.desc: The algorithm considers visible area, z-order, and overlap to pick the right window.
features.global.title: Global Hotkeys
features.global.desc: Works no matter which application is currently focused. Always ready.
features.custom.title: Fully Customizable
features.custom.desc: Record any modifier + key combination you prefer. Make it yours.
features.menubar.title: Menu Bar Native
features.menubar.desc: Lives quietly in your menu bar. Optionally hides from Dock. Launches at login.
howItWorks.label: — How It Works
howItWorks.title: See it in action
howItWorks.subtitle: Click the arrows or press ↑ ↓ ← → on your keyboard
howItWorks.algo.title: Smart Selection Algorithm
shortcuts.label: — Default Shortcuts
shortcuts.title: Ready out of the box
shortcuts.note: All shortcuts are fully customizable in settings.
quickstart.label: — Get Started
quickstart.title: Up and running in minutes
quickstart.step1.title: Download
quickstart.step1.desc: Grab the latest .dmg from GitHub Releases, or build from source.
quickstart.step2.title: Install
quickstart.step2.desc: Open the .dmg and drag Visual Focusing to Applications.
quickstart.step3.title: Grant Permission
quickstart.step3.desc: Launch the app and grant Accessibility permission when prompted.
